name: bloxdhop.io
description:
Play through colourful obbys and make your way to the end of the maps! Twist, turn, run and jump your way through large themed worlds - all without falling to your demise. Race to the end, get a high score and earn gold while doing so.

Controls:
WASD - movement
Shift - Run (alternately, double tap w)
Crouch - C (alternately, Z, | or CAPS LOCK)
Chat - T or ENTER
Open Shop - B
Start command - /
